Summary: Biochemical reaction from risperidone to paliperidone. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2D6, CYP3A4 or CYP3A5.
Biochemical reaction from risperidone to risperidone m3. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP3A5.
Transport from risperidone to risperidone. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCB1 or ABCG2.
